title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - Crisis Response Capability

description.narrative: To conduct or support programs providing training and equipment to national security forces of foreign countries for the purpose of building capacity of partner nations. The Defense Security Cooperation Agency (DSCA) provides program management. Country teams work through DoD geographic Combatant Commands (COCOMs).

title.narrative: Ministry of Defense Advisors Program

description.narrative: The Ministry of Defense Advisors (MoDA) program partners senior Department of Defense (DoD) civilian experts with foreign counterparts to improve ministerial capacity. A MoDA assisted the Kosovar Ministry of Defense with manpower reform initiatives. Long-term reform objectives were achieved.

description.narrative: Kosovo - Disaster Preparedness Post Assessment Workshop.. description.narrative: Kosovo - Human Resource Management #4.
